subject: RE: [junit] JUnit & IntelliJ
msgSnippet: IntelliJ s IDEA version 2.5 is very nicely integrated with JUnit. You did not say which version you are using. Check out their website www.intellij.com The
messageBody:
IntelliJ's IDEA version 2.5 is very nicely integrated with JUnit. You did
not say which
version you are using. Check out their website www.intellij.com

The older version 1 did not have any direct support for JUnit. But since you
can make any
class the target of the Run command you can setup your project such that Run
runs
the appropriate TestRunner.


Erik Husby
